## File Listing

The file content with the documentation metadata removed is:

<ProgramListing>

<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===- GlobalMerge.cpp - Internal globals merging -------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass merges globals with internal linkage into one. This way all the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// globals which were merged into a biggest one can be addressed using offsets</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from the same base pointer (no need for separate base pointer for each of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// global). Such a transformation can significantly reduce the register pressure</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when many globals are involved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example, consider the code which touches several global variables at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// once:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// static int foo&#91;N&#93;, bar&#91;N&#93;, baz&#91;N&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for (i = 0; i &lt; N; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    foo&#91;i&#93; = bar&#91;i&#93; &#42; baz&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  On ARM the addresses of 3 arrays should be kept in the registers, thus</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  this code has quite large register pressure (loop body):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ldr     r1, &#91;r5&#93;, #4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ldr     r2, &#91;r6&#93;, #4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  mul     r1, r2, r1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  str     r1, &#91;r0&#93;, #4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Pass converts the code to something like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  static struct &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    int foo&#91;N&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    int bar&#91;N&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    int baz&#91;N&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#125; merged;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  for (i = 0; i &lt; N; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    merged.foo&#91;i&#93; = merged.bar&#91;i&#93; &#42; merged.baz&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  and in ARM code this becomes:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ldr     r0, &#91;r5, #40&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ldr     r1, &#91;r5, #80&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  mul     r0, r1, r0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  str     r0, &#91;r5&#93;, #4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  note that we saved 2 registers here almostly &quot;for free&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// However, merging globals can have tradeoffs:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - it confuses debuggers, tools, and users</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - it makes linker optimizations less useful (order files, LOHs, ...)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - it forces usage of indexed addressing (which isn&#39;t necessarily &quot;free&quot;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - it can increase register pressure when the uses are disparate enough.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We use heuristics to discover the best global grouping we can (cf cl::opts).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ===---------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Globals, &#91;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable">GlobalVariable</a> &#42;GV1, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable">GlobalVariable</a> &#42;GV2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We don&#39;t support scalable global variables.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeAllocSize(GV1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#af1dd2acfc2950742e41a64a342b15c80">getValueType</a>()).getFixedValue() &lt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">               <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeAllocSize(GV2-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#af1dd2acfc2950742e41a64a342b15c80">getValueType</a>()).getFixedValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we want to just blindly group all globals together, do so.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#a1960d22dc4f1edcba4acdf74f2d86e87">GlobalMergeGroupByUse</a> || (Opt.MergeConstAggressive &amp;&amp; isConst)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> AllGlobals(Globals.size(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> doMerge(Globals, AllGlobals, M, isConst, AddrSpace);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we want to be smarter, look at all uses of each global, to try to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// discover all sets of globals used together, and how many times each of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// these sets occurred.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep this reasonably efficient, by having an append-only list of all sets</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// discovered so far (UsedGlobalSet), and mapping each &quot;together-ness&quot; unit of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// code (currently, a Function) to the set of globals seen so far that are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// used together in that unit (GlobalUsesByFunction).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When we look at the Nth global, we know that any new set is either:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - the singleton set &#123;N&#125;, containing this global only, or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - the union of &#123;N&#125; and a previously-discovered set, containing some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   combination of the previous N-1 globals.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Using that knowledge, when looking at the Nth global, we can keep:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - a reference to the singleton set &#123;N&#125; (CurGVOnlySetIdx)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - a list mapping each previous set to its union with &#123;N&#125; (EncounteredUGS),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if it actually occurs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We keep track of the sets of globals used together &quot;close enough&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">UsedGlobalSet &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BitVector <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-textstubv5-cpp-/#ad2f3f81faa370c8bf9a1f81612c90adfa426653d07c551d3092a6515150906380">Globals</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UsageCount = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UsedGlobalSet(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>) : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-textstubv5-cpp-/#ad2f3f81faa370c8bf9a1f81612c90adfa426653d07c551d3092a6515150906380">Globals</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Each set is unique in UsedGlobalSets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;UsedGlobalSet&gt; UsedGlobalSets;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Avoid repeating the create-global-set pattern.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CreateGlobalSet = &#91;&amp;&#93;() -&gt; UsedGlobalSet &amp; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UsedGlobalSets.emplace&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-textstubv5-cpp-/#ad2f3f81faa370c8bf9a1f81612c90adfa426653d07c551d3092a6515150906380">Globals</a>.size());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UsedGlobalSets.back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The first set is the empty set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CreateGlobalSet().UsageCount = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We define &quot;close enough&quot; to be &quot;in the same function&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Grouping uses by function is way too aggressive, so we should have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a better metric for distance between uses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The obvious alternative would be to group by BasicBlock, but that&#39;s in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// turn too conservative..</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Anything in between wouldn&#39;t be trivial to compute, so just stick with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// per-function grouping.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The value type is an index into UsedGlobalSets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The default (0) conveniently points to the empty set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;UsedGlobalSetIdx&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&gt; GlobalUsesByFunction;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now, look at each merge-eligible global in turn.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep track of the sets we already encountered to which we added the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// current global.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Each element matches the same-index element in UsedGlobalSets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This lets us efficiently tell whether a set has already been expanded to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// include the current global.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;size&#95;t&gt; EncounteredUGS;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GI = 0, GE = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-textstubv5-cpp-/#ad2f3f81faa370c8bf9a1f81612c90adfa426653d07c551d3092a6515150906380">Globals</a>.size(); GI != GE; ++GI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable">GlobalVariable</a> &#42;GV = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-textstubv5-cpp-/#ad2f3f81faa370c8bf9a1f81612c90adfa426653d07c551d3092a6515150906380">Globals</a>&#91;GI&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reset the encountered sets for this global and grow it in case we created</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// new sets for the previous global.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">    EncounteredUGS.assign(UsedGlobalSets.size(), 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We might need to create a set that only consists of the current global.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep track of its index into UsedGlobalSets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurGVOnlySetIdx = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each global, look at all its Uses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;U : GV-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#abf855b7cd63a0cd7f73759e396f280c9">uses</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This Use might be a ConstantExpr.  We&#39;re interested in Instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// users, so look through ConstantExpr...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> &#42;UI, &#42;UE;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantexpr">ConstantExpr</a> &#42;CE = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ConstantExpr&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea4c614360da93c0a041b22e537de151eb">U</a>.getUser())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/wineh/#a1c8d8103d6b914c2ade85873cb97f6d9a7a86131338bf955e0a56311f264aa6aa">CE</a>-&gt;use&#95;empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">        UI = &amp;&#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/wineh/#a1c8d8103d6b914c2ade85873cb97f6d9a7a86131338bf955e0a56311f264aa6aa">CE</a>-&gt;use&#95;begin();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">        UE = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea4c614360da93c0a041b22e537de151eb">U</a>.getUser())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">        UI = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea4c614360da93c0a041b22e537de151eb">U</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">        UE = UI-&gt;getNext();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...to iterate on all the instruction users of the global.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that we iterate on Uses and not on Users to be able to getNext().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (; UI != UE; UI = UI-&gt;getNext()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(UI-&gt;getUser());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;ParentFn = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#a739b30c811f1eece61b05320ddf44e5b">getParent</a>()-&gt;getParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we&#39;re only optimizing for size, ignore non-minsize functions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opt.SizeOnly &amp;&amp; !ParentFn-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#a548cfb9440f36ba67fc5566b8e967fc6">hasMinSize</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UGSIdx = GlobalUsesByFunction&#91;ParentFn&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is the first global the function uses, map it to the set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// consisting of this global only.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!UGSIdx) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If that set doesn&#39;t exist yet, create it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CurGVOnlySetIdx) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">            CurGVOnlySetIdx = UsedGlobalSets.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">            CreateGlobalSet().Globals.set(GI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">            ++UsedGlobalSets&#91;CurGVOnlySetIdx&#93;.UsageCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">          GlobalUsesByFunction&#91;ParentFn&#93; = CurGVOnlySetIdx;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we already encountered a use of this global in this function, just</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// increment the counter.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UsedGlobalSets&#91;UGSIdx&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-textstubv5-cpp-/#ad2f3f81faa370c8bf9a1f81612c90adfa426653d07c551d3092a6515150906380">Globals</a>.test(GI)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ++UsedGlobalSets&#91;UGSIdx&#93;.UsageCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If not, the previous set wasn&#39;t actually used in this function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">        --UsedGlobalSets&#91;UGSIdx&#93;.UsageCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we already expanded the previous set to include this global, just</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reuse that expanded set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ExpandedIdx = EncounteredUGS&#91;UGSIdx&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ++UsedGlobalSets&#91;ExpandedIdx&#93;.UsageCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">          GlobalUsesByFunction&#91;ParentFn&#93; = ExpandedIdx;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If not, create a new set consisting of the union of the previous set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and this global.  Mark it as encountered, so we can reuse it later.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">        GlobalUsesByFunction&#91;ParentFn&#93; = EncounteredUGS&#91;UGSIdx&#93; =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">            UsedGlobalSets.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">        UsedGlobalSet &amp;NewUGS = CreateGlobalSet();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NewUGS.Globals.set(GI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NewUGS.Globals |= UsedGlobalSets&#91;UGSIdx&#93;.Globals;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can choose to merge all globals together, but ignore globals never used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with another global.  This catches the obviously non-profitable cases of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// having a single global, but is aggressive enough for any other case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a0dfd5c2b6d43efae54c3f78be2450481">GlobalMergeIgnoreSingleUse</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> AllGlobals(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-textstubv5-cpp-/#ad2f3f81faa370c8bf9a1f81612c90adfa426653d07c551d3092a6515150906380">Globals</a>.size());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UsedGlobalSet &amp;UGS : UsedGlobalSets) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UGS.UsageCount == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UGS.Globals.count() &gt; 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">        AllGlobals |= UGS.Globals;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> doMerge(Globals, AllGlobals, M, isConst, AddrSpace);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now we found a bunch of sets of globals used together.  We accumulated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the number of times we encountered the sets (i.e., the number of functions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that use that exact set of globals).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Multiply that by the size of the set to give us a crude profitability</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// metric.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a076f93c387f454f0db13d4bc7d4e7f9c">llvm::stable&#95;sort</a>(UsedGlobalSets,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UsedGlobalSet &amp;UGS1, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UsedGlobalSet &amp;UGS2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UGS1.Globals.count() &#42; UGS1.UsageCount &lt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             UGS2.Globals.count() &#42; UGS2.UsageCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Starting from the sets with the best (=biggest) profitability, find a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// good combination.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The ideal (and expensive) solution can only be found by trying all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// combinations, looking for the one with the best profitability.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t be smart about it, and just pick the first compatible combination,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// starting with the sets with the best profitability.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> PickedGlobals(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-textstubv5-cpp-/#ad2f3f81faa370c8bf9a1f81612c90adfa426653d07c551d3092a6515150906380">Globals</a>.size());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UsedGlobalSet &amp;UGS : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">llvm::reverse</a>(UsedGlobalSets)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UGS.UsageCount == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PickedGlobals.anyCommon(UGS.Globals))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PickedGlobals |= UGS.Globals;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the set only contains one global, there&#39;s no point in merging.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ignore the global for inclusion in other sets though, so keep it in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PickedGlobals.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UGS.Globals.count() &lt; 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> |= doMerge(Globals, UGS.Globals, M, isConst, AddrSpace);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GlobalMergeImpl::doMerge(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;GlobalVariable &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;Globals,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ssize&#95;t i = GlobalSet.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a2da3bac3ad70ccb97150626385ebd6a7">find&#95;first</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (i != -1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ssize&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea363b122c528f54df4a0446b6bab05515">j</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t MergedSize = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::vector&lt;Type&#42;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#a042f275033dbeb7761b82e5368e871bf">Tys</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasExternal = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> FirstExternalName;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> MaxAlign;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurIdx = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (j = i; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea363b122c528f54df4a0446b6bab05515">j</a> != -1; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea363b122c528f54df4a0446b6bab05515">j</a> = GlobalSet.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a9941bbcdd7fadda44146fcc6f91af71f">find&#95;next</a>(j)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure we use the same alignment AsmPrinter would use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getPreferredAlign(Globals&#91;j&#93;);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit an alias for the original variable name. This is necessary for an</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This &#95;should&#95; also work on Mach-O ever since &#39;.alt&#95;entry&#39; support was</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// added in 2016 Unfortunately, there&#39;s a bug in ld-prime (present at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// least from Xcode 15 through Xcode 16.0), in which -dead&#95;strip doesn&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// always honor alt&#95;entry. To workaround this issue, we don&#39;t emit aliases</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on Mach-O. Except, we &#95;must&#95; do so for external symbols. That means</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MergeExternal is broken with that linker. (That option is currently off</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!IsMachO || <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/dxilfinalizelinkage-cpp/#ae721973516c2b86042a5127b776e2806">Linkage</a> == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#aedfa75f0c85c4aa85b257f066fbea57ca6c93794d7b99cd433e96c53eadb15a6e">GlobalValue::ExternalLinkage</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
